page.title: 05HOME FARM :MR.and MRS.BICK
page.content: {Mr.Bick}owns {Home Farm},Swindon Village.He has got 50 beef cattle,two cats and one dog. He has got thirty seven acres of land divided into four fields.He has old tools hung up on the walls around the brick shed. In the farm house there is a well 30 feet or 10 metres deep.They sometimes grow corn in the same fields every year but try to rotate the crops.They don't live in the farm house any more because it is very big and difficult to heat,so they live in a bungalow.The house has been empty three years .The house was built in eighteen forty five. They have a muck spreader,baler,mowing machine, bale loader,and hay turner. Mr. Bick makes two thousand,five hundred bales of hay a year. He hopes to use the empty barns for a craft work shop in the future.
